param.name: bam_alignments
param.label: BAM alignment file
param.help: BAM alignment file. Can be generated from SAM files using the SAM Tools.

param.name: accpred
param.label: Acceptor splice site predictions in SPF format
param.help: The prediction file contains a signal prediction score for each candidate acceptor splice site. It can be generated with ASP.

param.name: donpred
param.label: Donor splice site predictions in SPF format
param.help: The prediction file contains a signal prediction score for each candidate donor splice site. It can be generated with ASP.

param.name: anno_input
param.label: Genome annotation in GFF3
param.help: Partial genome annotation in GFF3 format describing the known gene structures for the provided genome.
